content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'ucext_sadataengci_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [ucext_sadataengci_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://ucext@sadataengci.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.data_pipeline_config (
	[id] int,
	[is_active] bit,
	[field_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[field_desc] nvarchar(4000),
	[field_separator] nvarchar(4000),
	[language_separator] nvarchar(4000),
	[tgt_field_prefix] nvarchar(4000),
	[source_system] nvarchar(4000),
	[created_at] datetime2(7),
	[updated_at] datetime2(7)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'raw/data_pipeline_config/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [ucext_sadataengci_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.data_pipeline_config
GO
